mapper.select: select count(*) from ope_allocate_b allocateb inner join ope_parts parts on parts.id = allocateb.part_id where allocateb.dr = 0 and allocateb.allocate_id=#{id}

select allocateb.allocate_id as id, allocateb.id as childOrderId, allocateb.part_id as partId, parts.id_class as idClass, parts.parts_number as partN, parts.cn_name as partCnName, allocateb.preparation_wait_qty as preparationWaitQty, '2' as sourceType from ope_allocate_b allocateb inner join ope_parts parts on parts.id = allocateb.part_id where allocateb.dr = 0 and allocateb.allocate_id=#{id} order by allocateb.created_time asc
select count(*) from ope_stock_bill bill inner join ope_allocate allocate on bill.source_id = allocate.id where bill.dr = 0 and allocate.status = 1 and bill.source_type = 2

select allocate.id as id, 2 as sourceType, allocate.allocate_num as allocatN, allocate.created_time as createdTime, allocate.preparation_wait_total as preparationWaitTotal from ope_allocate allocate where allocate.status = 1 order by allocate.created_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from ope_stock_bill bill inner join ope_assembly_order assem on bill.source_id = assem.id where bill.dr = 0 and assem.status = 1 and bill.source_type = 3

select assem.id as id, 3 as sourceType, assem.assembly_number as allocatN, assem.created_time as createdTime, assem.wait_preparation_total as preparationWaitTotal from ope_assembly_order assem where assem.status = 2 order by assem.created_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from ope_assembly_order_part opart inner join ope_parts parts on parts.id = opart.part_id where opart.dr = 0 and opart.assembly_id =#{id} order by opart.created_time asc

select opart.assembly_id as id, opart.id as childOrderId, opart.part_id as partId, parts.id_class as idClass, parts.parts_number as partN, parts.cn_name as partCnName, opart.wait_preparation_qty as preparationWaitQty, 3 as sourceType from ope_assembly_order_part opart inner join ope_parts parts on parts.id = opart.part_id where opart.dr = 0 and opart.assembly_id =#{id} order by opart.created_time asc

select stock.materiel_product_id as partId, stockBill.id as stockBillId, stockBill.source_type as sourceType, stock.id as stockId from ope_stock_bill stockBill inner join ope_stock stock on stockBill.stock_id = stock.id where stockBill.source_type = #{value} and stockBill.source_id = #{id};
